cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the transmission and scheduling aspects of distributed storage, which are typically studied in the areas of information theory (cs.IT) and networking (cs.NI). The paper also focuses on index coding, which is a topic in both information theory and distributed systems (cs.DS). Additionally, the paper discusses the effect of message distribution and redundancy across the network, which is related to network coding (cs.SI) and coding theory (cs.CC).
